attributes.action: Charge 'Leave' leaders with undermining democracy through deliberate dishonesty
attributes.additional_details: Democracy doesn't work unless it is underpinned by honesty and facts. The most severe punishments must be given to those who undermine democracy in this way, in order to reflect the magnitude of their crime and to deter others insistent on manipulating the electorate for their own political ends. Leave's key campaign pledges have been show to be based on lies, lies which have cost millions of people their right to a politically stable and financially secure future.
attributes.background: The British people have just voted to leave the European Union after being told what have been shown to be outright lies. This has and will continue to massively affect the lives of everyone concerned. Unless action is taken against those responsible, democratic processes will suffer or fail.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for decisions to charge people with crimes.
